description:
Even former Nintendo of America president Reggie Fils-Aime was surprised by the somewhat sparse launch lineup of the Nintendo Switch 2.

"I wouldn't be completely honest if [I didn't say] from a business perspective, when I first saw that lineup, I scratched my head a little bit," said Fils-Aime--who served as Nintendo of America's president and chief operating officer from 2006 until he retired in 2019--during an interview with The Game Business. "But I think certainly what I underestimated was the enhanced performance, the enhanced Nintendo Switch 1 content, I think has been compelling. The stuff that you get for free as part of the Nintendo Switch Online subscription, I think that has helped drive some of the momentum. And then certainly Bananza was a key driver for them."

When the original Switch launched in 2017, it was accompanied by The Legend of Zelda: Breathe o
title: Former Nintendo Exec Was Surprised By Switch 2 Launch Lineup
Lego's Adorable Toy Story Train And RC Car Playset Is On Sale For The First Time

description:
The first Super Mario Bros. animated movie pulled references from across Mario lore, and while The Super Mario Galaxy Movie wears its main inspiration in its title, the sequel will be no different. Even in the initial trailer for the upcoming movie, there were already several hints and nods to different Super Mario titles from the franchise's 40 years of history.

This trailer gave us our first looks at Brie Larson's Princess Rosalina and Benny Safdie's Bowser Jr. But let's look at some of the smaller details in this first look at
title: All The Easter Eggs And References You May Have Missed In The Super Mario Galaxy Movie Trailer
Save 50% On Twin Peaks: Fire Walk With Me And More David Lynch Films On 4K Blu-Ray

description:
After starring in multiple Naughty Dog games, actor Troy Baker continues his working relationship with the studio for Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet. The actor recently discussed working with director Neil Druckmann, what it feels like to not play the lead in a Naughty Dog game, and how he wants to have a career similar to Oscar-winner George Clooney.

Speaking to ComicBook, Baker said one thing that's stayed the same working with Druckmann on Intergalactic after starring in The Last of Us series as Joel and as Sam in Uncharted 4 is that they still butt heads.

"Neil and I will always, it's our vibe," he said. "We just love to butt up against each other. We were doing a table read, and I was literally
title: Intergalactic Actor Talks About Clashing With Neil Druckmann And Wanting To Be Like George Clooney

description:
The two-decade wait for player housing in World of Warcraft is nearly over, as Blizzard has announced housing will launch on December 2 for those who preorder the Midnight expansion.

Housing will be launching into what Blizzard is calling "early access"--and will support weekly housing quests but won't have its Neighborhood event system fully online. Players will, however, be able to buy a home, decorate it, design rooms, join Neighborhoods, earn decor through achievements, and craft decor items. Those who don't own Midnight won't be able to purchase a home but will still be able to acquire housing items and decor, should they later decide to upgrade to the new expansion.
title: WoW Player Housing Finally Arrives December 2 After Decades Of Waiting

description:
As part of Valve's big hardware announcements today, the company did not disclose a price for the new Steam Machine device. Hardware engineer Yazan Aldehayyat was asked in an interview about what Valve's position is, at a high level, regarding pricing, and Aldehayyat said the aim is to land at a "competitive price" that matches up with the value provided. This is what most companies say about their new products, and Valve is following suit. The aim, he said, is to make it "affordable."

"If you're trying to make a PC that has similar features and similar performance, I think the Steam Machine is going to be a really competitive price to that and provide really good value to it," he told IGN.

Aldehayyat said affordab
title: How Much Will Steam Machine Cost? Here's What Valve Had To Say About Pricing

description:
Less than two weeks after its official launch, Arc Raiders now has duo matchmaking. Developer Embark Studios quietly tested the feature before fully unveiling it to players and explaining how it works.

In a post on Arc Raiders' official site, the devs noted that duo matchmaking "is not a 100% guaranteed system." Solo players and squads are prioritized to play separately, and duos are ideally paired up with other duos, while trios get to play bands of trios. However, Embark warns that "you may at times run into differing constellations of players other than your own."

Following up on feedback from fans, Embark will lower the prices on some of the cosmetic items in the store starting on November 13. Anyone who purchased items for their original price will be refunded the difference.
title: Arc Raiders Adds Duo-Queue Matchmaking
The Simpsons Treehouse Of Horror Comic Omnibus Trilogy Is 50% Off At Amazon

description:
Arc Raiders stormed onto the scene in the fall of 2025 and quickly blew up to become one of the biggest games going. With dozens of quests, a mountainous pile of loot that can overwhelm even advanced players, and the constant push and pull of its PvPvE landscape, it's definitely a game where the best players are often the most informed players. Thankfully, we have dozens of Arc Raiders guides here to shape you into such a raider yourself. Use our guides hub below for all of your Arc Raiders needs.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Getting started in Arc Raiders
  • Arc Raiders quests

Getting started in Arc Raiders

These guides will help you hit the ground
title: Arc Raiders Guides Hub

description:
Simpsons season is the talk of the Fortnite town right now, but this crossover event is only gonna last four weeks. Before we know it, Epic's metaverse will be moving on to something else. And that something is Chapter 7, which will introduce a new season of battle royale with an entirely new map and a loot pool full of weapons we've never seen before.

The start of a new chapter is the biggest happening in Fortnite each year, and there's no reason to expect it to be any different this year. Let's take a look at what we know so far, which is actually more than usual this far out.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • When will Fortnite Chapter 7 begin?

When will Fortnite Chapter 7
title: Fortnite Chapter 7: Start Date, New Map, And Everything We Know So Far

description:
For the Arc Raiders Turnabout quest, Celeste has asked you to visit the North Trench Tower in Spaceport and upload some blackmail files. It sounds like risky business, but that's par for the course in Arc Raiders. In this guide, we'll fill you in on what you need to know about the Turnabout quest and how to complete it.

Note that when you accept this quest, Celeste will provide you with one Spaceport Trench Tower Key. This key must be in your inventory during the raid to complete this quest. Since you'll be heading to a quest area that may be populated with other raiders, it's probably best to toss your Spaceport Trench Tower Key in a safe pocket.

If you lose the Spaceport Trench Tower Key, you'll be unable to complete the quest until you obtain another. As with nearly all keys in Arc Raiders, the drop rate is fairly low and random--though many players seem to ha
title: Arc Raiders Turnabout Quest Guide

description:
Fortnite's Simpsons season, which took over Battle Royale last week with a new Springfield-themed island map, got a welcome injection of new cartoonish weapons you can wield against your enemies in this week's update. The loot pool now includes Bart's Slingshot, which leaves a poison cloud where it lands, Moe's 5 Gun, which is five guns in one, and the Deodorant Applicator, which is a mid-range laser gun.

When Fortnite's Simpsons season began, it had a very noticeable lack of Simpsons-themed weapons. The loot pool had tons of Simpsons healing items, like Krusty Burgers and Super
title: Fortnite Added A Pile Of Absurd New Simpsons Guns This Week

description:
Though most quests in Arc Raiders send you off to collect a quest-specific item, Celeste has decided to complicate your journey just a bit. In Tribute to Toledo, you'll be asked to track down a Power Rod, an Epic-tier item that is quite hard to come by while shooting and looting on your topside adventures. Don't worry, though, as we'll fill you in on some good ways to get your hands on a hard-to-find Power Rod.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Where to get a Power Rod in Arc Raiders
    • How to get Power Rods from the Spaceport Rocket Assembly

Where to get a Power Rod in Arc Raiders

There are a few ways to get Power Rods in Arc Raiders, ranging fr
title: Arc Raiders - Tribute To Toledo Quest Guide

description:
If Lance has given you the Life of a Pharmacist quest in Arc Raiders, you've come to the right place. This quest requires you to head to the Arbusto Farmacia in Buried City and document some things about a pharmacist. Below, we'll fill you in on each location of the quest objectives and everything else you need to know about surviving this mission topside.

You won't need to extract to complete Life of a Pharmacist, so toss on a free loadout if you want to play things safely. If you're feeling cocky, though, go ahead and bring in the big guns. There's some decent loot in the Arbusto Farmacia, too, so there's no harm in protecting yourself so you can take it all for yourself.

Here's how to complete Life of a Pharmacist in Arc Raiders.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Arc Raiders Life Of A Pharmacist Quest Guide

description:
Most Arc Raiders quests send you topside to investigate, gather resources, or obtain some type of intel. This trend continues with Reduced to Rubble, which begins with asking you to do the simplest thing you've done in the game so far: take a photo. Hey, sounds easy enough, right? Let's find out.

Luckily, you won't need to extract to complete Reduced to Rubble, so you should bring in a free loadout if you're not familiar with the Blue Gate map or feel a bit nervous about losing any of your good loot. With the above-average amount of ARC roaming about on this map, things can go bad in the blink of an eye, so it's better to be safe than sorry.

When you're ready to complete Reduced to Rubble, here's how to make it so.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Arc Raiders Reduced To Rubble Quest Guide

description:
Valve has announced three new Steam hardware products, which will all be shipping out in early 2026. Next year will see the launch of a new Steam Controller, a Steam Machine for PC gaming, and the Steam Frame VR headset, with specific launch timing and pricing to be shared after the first of the year.

Steam Controller
title: Valve Reveals New Hardware Lineup: A Controller, Compact Gaming PC, and VR-Ready Headset

description:
It's the fifth anniversary of the PS5 console, but right now, it's time to dig into the list of new games headed to the PlayStation Plus Game Catalog for PS Plus Extra and Premium subscribers. Available starting November 18, subscribers can look forward to a varied--but interesting--collection of games that cover old-school tomb-raiding, spine-tingling horror, and a classic of the open-world genre. Rumors this week of GTA 5 coming back to PS Plus are indeed true, and you can also explore a zone full of weird science in Pacific Drive, or go on effortlessly charming romp through a quaint British village in Thank Goodness You're Here.

In case you missed it, the November free games for PS Plus subscribers--Stray, EA Sports WRC 24, and Totally Accurate Battle Sim
title: PlayStation Plus Extra/Premium Games For November 2025 Include Chilling Horror And Monster Trucks

description:
In the MCU, Brie Larson is best known for playing Carol Danvers/Captain Marvel. But next year, she's joining the Nintendo universe in The Super Mario Bros. Galaxy Movie. Larson is set to provide the voice of Mario's new friend, Princess Rosalina. Years ago, Larson was an avid Super Mario Galaxy player, and she had an appropriate response to ex-boyfriend when he said she was too devoted to the game.

Larson shared the story in 2020 (via Nintendo Life) when she launched her YouTube channel. In her initial video, Larson noted that she became a gamer because of her love for Super Mario Bros. and The Little Mermaid on the NES. She went on
title: Brie Larson Once Took Drastic Action When Told She Took Super Mario Galaxy Too Seriously

description:
Battlefield Redsec launched recently, and among the complaints about the battle royale game was that it has no olos playlist. One may be coming, however.

Design director Justin Wiebe told IGN, "I would say keep your ear to the ground on the future of solos." For now, however, Wiebe wanted to talk more about the reasons why Redsec has no solos playlist.

As for why Redsec doesn't have a solos playlist, Wiebe said the game was built as a "squad-based experience" and it's not as simple as you might think to add so
title: Why Battlefield Redsec Doesn't Have Solos, And If It Ever Could

description:
One of the last quests in the first batch of Arc Raiders quests is called Armored Transports. This quest requires you to round up a key on Blue Gate and use it to open one of the armored patrol cars scattered around the middle portion of the map. In this guide, we'll tell you where to find the key and how to spot one of these vehicles.

You need to extract from Blue Gate once you've completed this quest, so bring in a good loadout--including a solid shield and weapon you're comfortable with--to reduce any concerns that you might lose some good stuff if you find yourself in a battle.

Once you're ready to head out, here's how to complete the Armored Transport quest.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Arc Raiders Armored Transports Quest Guide
TMNT Trilogy Limited Edition 4K Box Set Preorder Gets 40% Discount At Amazon

description:
Sony Interactive Entertainment and French developer Oh BiBi have announced Ratchet & Clank: Ranger Rumble, a free-to-play multiplayer arena shooter coming to iOS and Android. Fans can now pre-register for the game through the official website. It's been four years since the last Ratchet and Clank game, and this takes the duo into the mobile gaming space for the first time in years, offering a new way for players to experience its well-known humor and action.

Ranger Rumble brings back familiar characters from the Ratchet & Clank universe in a fast-paced, real-time multiplayer format. Players can choose to fight solo or team up with others in exciting online matches. Each hero comes with unique abilities and access to a variety of powerful, over-the-top weapons. The game aims to capture the fun and energy of the se
title: Ratchet & Clank: Ranger Rumble Is A Brand-New Game, And Probably Not What You Expected

description:
Former Sony executive Shuhei Yoshida has suggested that it was the original PlayStation that brought us From Software as a developer and Bloodborne as a game.

Speaking to Simon Parkin on the latest episode of his My Perfect Console podcast, Yoshida said the industry's jump from cartridges to CDs enticed From Software to transition from a business software company to a game software company. As Yoshida recalled, Sony, a newer entrant in the console-making business, was attempting to court the likes of Atlus and Namco to bring their games to the OG PlayStation system. Cartridges were expensive and small in data capacity. CDs, Yoshida said, were much cheaper, quicker to manufacture, and capable of storing larger sets of data. From Software thus saw an opportunity to try something new.

"They didn'
title: Thank The OG PlayStation For Bringing Us Bloodborne

description:
Activision has released more details on what its teams are doing to try to stop cheaters in Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 for its upcoming launch this week.

In a blog post, Activision reminded people that they need TPM 2.0 and Secure Boot to play Black Ops 7 on PC as the foundation for anti-cheat measures. Activision says this can be thought of as a handshake that tells its Ricochet anti-cheat system about your PC, "I'm legit. Let's play."

The developer said it has "evolved" its machine-learning-based anti-cheat measures with the aim of helping the system become "smarter, faster, and fairer."

Continue
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7 -- How Activision Is Trying To Stop Cheaters

description:
Arc Raiders' first major update is upon us, and it's a doozy. Hot off the heels of a successful launch, developer Embark Studios is already introducing a new map to explore, two new ARC enemies to take down, fresh weapons and playstyles for players to check out, and more. It's a rather staggering amount of new content for a game that just released, so let's dive in and see what the fuss is all about.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • What's new in Arc Raiders' North Line update
    • New map and community unlock event

What's new in Arc Raiders' North Line update

There's plenty of new stuff to see in Arc Raiders' North Line update, with the star
title: Everything New In Arc Raiders North Line Update - Full Details

description:
The PlayStation 5 is celebrating its 5-year anniversary today, November 12, 2025. Below, we take an in-depth look at the rise of the plucky little mascot, Astro Bot. The pack-in PS5 game Astro's Playroom popularized the character and led to his own award-winning standalone game.

Is Astro, the star of Astro's Playroom and Astro Bot, a Sony mascot? Nicolas Doucet isn't so sure. While the soft-spoken head of Team Asobi recognizes that the plucky little robot has the makings of a marquee character, and while it's become the face of the studio and even graces its logo, he also doesn't think it's his or the studio's place to say. To hear him tell it, a mascot is grown organically out of affection from fans, not a status assigned by corporate masters. On a recent trip to Team Asobi's studio in Japan, we got an up-close look at how Astro came to be and the design philosophy that drives the studio's playful, polished little automaton.

Birt
title: The New Face Of PlayStation And The Technomagic Behind Astro Bot
The New Backbone Pro: Xbox Edition Brings Console-Style Controls To Your Phone

description:
Spider-Man: Miles Morales is celebrating its 5-year anniversary today, November 12, 2025. Below, we examine how the half-sequel capitalized on its smaller scope by telling a more intimate story.

Miles Morales swings past a small bodega as snow flurries catch the streetlights. Below him, vendors huddle in heavy coats, music spills from a corner bodega, and the streets of Harlem glow warm against the winter cold. The rhythm of the city seems to match his own momentum--fast, hopeful, alive. It’s familiar territory, but not quite the same New York Peter Parker protected previously. The city feels different now, more personal. It’s Miles’ home.

When Spider-Man: Miles Morales launched alongside the PlayStation 5 in November 2020, it didn’t look like a revolution. It wasn’t a full sequel, didn’t stretch across new boroughs, and didn’t introduce an entirely new rogues’ gallery. On paper, it was a stopgap--a smaller-scale spin-off meant to
title: Spider-Man: Miles Morales Enriched An Already Thriving New York

description:
The Super Mario Bros. Movie was a huge hit for Nintendo when it first arrived in 2023--becoming the highest-grossing video game movie of all time--and its success led to The Super Mario Galaxy Movie sequel being greenlit. While the first film laid the groundwork for Illumination's animated take on Mario, Luigi, and their first adventure into the Mushroom Kingdom, the next movie will go beyond that setting and explore the cosmos. Ahead of its release next year, here's everything we know so far about the Super Mario Galaxy Movie.

The Super Mario Galaxy Movie release date

The Super Mario Galaxy Movie will be released on April 3, 2026.

The Super Mario Galaxy Movie plot

No surprises here, but for now, the plot is still being kept under wraps. Judging by the trailer, it looks like Bowser Jr. will be the primary antagonist as he searches for a way to free hi
title: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie - Plot, Release Date, And Everything We Know

description:
The American Red Cross is teaming up with Pac-Man to celebrate the iconic game's 45th anniversary with a lifesaving mission: to find blood donors. You can schedule an appointment to donate blood, platelets, or AB Elite plasma today for patients who rely on blood transfusions during emergencies, treatments, and surgeries, to receive some official merch from this collaboration.

From November 17 through December 7, all who come to donate will receive exclusive Red Cross x Pac-Man socks and a limited-edition Pac-Man capsule toy, while supplies last. This campaign comes at a crucial time, as donor turnout has declined and the need for blood remains high during the holidays. Every donation helps ensure hospitals have enough for accident victims, cancer patients, and others in need.
title: You Can Donate Blood And Celebrate Pac-Man At The Same Time

description:
Activision has announced the first DLC for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, and it'll be available at launch, with proceeds going to military veterans via the company's Call of Duty Endowment charity.

The C.O.D.E. Legacy: Tracer Pack is modeled on the real-world veteran Danielle Green, who lost her arm in combat and later worked with the robotics company Open Bionics on a new prosthetic arm. Green, who is a Purple Heart recipient, lost her arm while deployed in Iraq in 2004 when an RPG blast ripped off part of her left arm. The military police officer was conducting a rooftop security mission in Baghdad when her life changed forever.
title: Black Ops 7 Day-One DLC Announced, Supports Military Veterans

description:
The CEO of Nexon Co., Ltd., the publisher of Embark Studios' mega-popular extraction shooter Arc Raiders, has added his opinions to the chorus around the game's use of AI voice acting, claiming that "every game company" is using AI in development.

After Eurogamer gave it two out of five stars, which prompted this discourse, CEO Junghun Lee said in an interview with Gamespark (translated by Automaton) that AI has "definitely improved efficiency" in game production and live-service operations.

"First of all, I think it's important to assume that every game company is now using AI," Lee said. "But if everyon
title: Arc Raiders Sparks Debate Over AI Voice Acting In Games

description:
In just a few months, seeing a Pikachu sitting between trees in the Pokemon Forest will become a reality with the opening of PokePark Kanto. The Tokyo-based attraction is set to welcome its first visitors on February 5.

The Pokemon Company has stated that tickets will go on sale November 21 at 1 AM PT / 4 AM ET. PokePark Kanto "will be the first-ever permanent outdoor Pokemon attraction," situated on 26,000 square meters of land at Yomiuriland. The Pokemon theme park is basically split up between two areas: Pokemon Forest and Sedge Town.
title: PokePark Kanto Gets Grand Opening Date, And It's Not Far Away

description:
Ahead of Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's release on November 14, Activision has confirmed a key detail about the multiplayer mode. Some playlists will indeed have skill-based matchmaking toggled on, but most won't.

Developer Treyarch said on social media that the majority of the Black Ops 7 multiplayer playlists will have what is described as "open" matchmaking. In these playlists, skill is only "minimally considered," just as it was during the Black Ops 7 beta where Activision first rolled this out.

The exception for Black Ops 7 will be one rotating Moshpit playlist where "skill will be an important consideration." Additionally, Black Ops 7 Ranked play will feature SBMM when it launches in Season 2.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Some Black Ops 7 Multiplayer Playlists Will Have SBMM, But Most Won't

description: After a quick teaser during the September Nintendo Direct, a new trailer for The Super Mario Galaxy movie has been revealed. The sequel to The Super Mario Bros. Movie is scheduled to be released on April 3, 2026, and it once again features the vocal talents of the 2023 film's cast, including Chris Pratt as Mario, Anya Taylor-Joy as Princess Peach, Charlie Day as Luigi, and Jack Black as Bowser.
title: New Super Mario Galaxy Movie Trailer Blasts Off For A Cosmic Adventure

description:
It is understood that Sony and Microsoft are working on new console platforms--the PS6 and next Xbox--but when might they be released? According to Piers Harding-Rolls, the research director for games at Ampere Analysis, these new consoles could launch later than expected due to the GTA 6 delay. This could happen, but it's not what Ampere expects.

He told GI.biz that the delay of GTA 6 will have a "significant impact on console sales dynamics in 2026." This is because, with GTA 6 now coming in November 2026 instead of May 2026, console sales will be "even
title: PS6 And Next Xbox May Not Release Until 2028 Due To GTA 6 Delay, Expert Says

description:
Former Nintendo of America president Reggie Fils-Aime has gone on record to say he is surprised that Microsoft has not yet "fully embraced" the Switch 2 when it comes to releasing games for it.

Speaking to The Game Business, Fils-Aime said, "Certainly some games could easily be ported over to Switch 2. And I'm surprised that we haven't seen more of that."

He added: "I thought there would be much more, especially during this timeframe leading into the holiday."

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Why Hasn't Xbox Brought More Games To Switch 2? Former Nintendo Exec Wonders

description:
Remember when we thought Elden Ring Nightreign's DLC would launch by the end of March 2026? Well, developer From Software said that's way too long and announced that the roguelike/souls-like's next add-on content, The Forsaken Hollows, hits consoles and PC on December 4. Happy holidays, you Nightfarers.

The Japanese developer made the announcement during PlayStation's State of Play livestream on November 11. The trailer, which made its way onto publisher Bandai Namco's official X account, isn't that long. But it does reveal two new playable characters, a new Shifting Earth event, and some new enemies.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign: The Forsaken Hollows DLC Announced And Coming Sooner Than We Thought

description:
Capcom has announced a new collaboration with KFC in Japan, themed around Monster Hunter Wilds. Starting on November 19, KFC branches will sell two limited-edition meals with unique packaging and codes for in-game items redeemable in Monster Hunter Wilds.

The packaging shows off art of a Felyne partner that accompanies players in Monster Hunter Wilds (via VGC), with the little critter cosplaying as KFC icon Colonel Sanders--complete with a trendy outfit and facial hair. The Feast Set comes with codes for a Luxury Ingredient Set of campfire cooking ingredients and the KFC Colonel Sanders Felyne charm, while the Spice Up Set includes a Hunting Item Set of consumable items and a KFC Barrel Felyne Charm. Upgrading a meal from standard to large will also get a themed sticker set.<
title: KFC And Monster Hunter Wilds Join Forces For Finger-Lickin' In-Game Loot

description:
Borderlands games are all about chasing down rare loot, and for Borderlands 4, players can once again expect to plug in some Shift codes to grab an instant high-caliber upgrade. Borderlands 4 supports Shift codes, and the ones that can be redeemed for Golden Keys will let you open the unique Golden Chests found in Belton's Bore, The Launchpad, Carcadia, or The Lockaway.

Each code you redeem will give you Golden Keys that can be used to unlock a treasure chest of rare goodies in the game or new cosmetics that you can apply to your Vault Hunter. We'll be keeping track of Shift codes and the games you can redeem them in, so you can check back often for updates.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Borderlands
title: Borderlands 4 Shift Codes: All Active Keys And How To Redeem Them
